name: GreenYogi
tag_list: green, organic, social, social-networking, news, ecommerce, wiki, directory, sustainable, eco, global-warming, events, blog, video, tv, green-tv, green-events, renewable
overview:
Relaying One GreenYogi’s Thoughts & Actions To Another

GreenYogi is geared to be a knowledge based ‘Green Lifestyle’ movement with a community centric approach. GreenYogi is a source of in-depth industry, conservancy, public policy, products, services news, events, communities and campaign resources.

To channelize communities in directions (using Information, Technology & Real World Grassroots Movements) to help alter the energy industry landscape, opinianate towards public policy, aid energy conservancy, instigate green lifestyle & socially responsible behavior towards mother earth is important to GreenYogi.

GreenYogi’s objective is to let majority and/or green opinion finds its way from one to another easily.

GreenYogi has content aggregation and community development reach in Australia, Canada, England, India, Ireland, New Zealand, Singapore and USA.

GreenYogi is a registered Corporation with the Secretary of the State of Texas, USA. GreenYogi has operational presence in USA, UK & India.
